snippet: Leinier Domínguez Perez needed a little bit of help from his rival Fabiano Caruana to overcome a bad start and to go on to win a top tournament in Thessaloniki, Greece.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column on Grand Prix tournament in Thesaloniki, Greece.
lead_paragraph: Leinier Domínguez Perez needed a little bit of help from his rival Fabiano Caruana to overcome a bad start and to go on to win a top tournament in Thessaloniki, Greece.

headline.print_headline: Rough Road to Victory At Grand Prix in Greece
headline.seo: Chess: Domínguez Wins Grand Prix in Greece
headline.main: Rough Road to Victory at Grand Prix in Greece
